home.title: Report Issues in Your
home.description: Easily report problems in your neighborhood - potholes, broken streetlights, water leaks, and more. Our AI automatically routes your report to the right government department.

seo.title: Denunciar - Community Issue Reporting
seo.description: Report problems in your community and get them resolved. AI-powered routing to government departments.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Report issues in three simple steps

report.title: 1. Report
report.description: Take a photo and describe the issue. Add the location using our map picker or GPS.

ai.title: 2. AI Routes
ai.description: Our AI analyzes your report and automatically suggests the right government department.

track.title: 3. Track
track.description: Monitor the status of your report and get updates as it's being resolved.

features.title: Features
features.description: Everything you need to report and track community issues

photo.title: Photo Evidence
photo.description: Upload photos to clearly document the issue and help responders understand the problem.

location.title: Precise Location
location.description: Use GPS, search by address, or drop a pin on the map to mark exactly where the issue is.

ai.title: AI Classification
ai.description: Our AI analyzes your report and automatically routes it to the appropriate department.

tracking.title: Status Tracking
tracking.description: Track your reports from submission to resolution. Get notified when there are updates.

multilang.title: Multiple Languages
multilang.description: Available in English and Spanish. More languages coming soon.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your data is protected with industry-standard security. Sign in securely with Google.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join your community in reporting and resolving local issues. Every report helps make our neighborhoods better.
